activities.name: Copy data from adls to new table

scripts.text:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS JSONTOSQL

CREATE TABLE JSONTOSQL(
EmpKey int,
EmpName varchar(20),
Contact varchar(20)
)

dependsOn.activity: Create Nested JSON Table in SQL

activities.name: Create Nested JSON Table in SQL

scripts.text:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS NESTEDJSONTOSQL

CREATE TABLE NESTEDJSONTOSQL(
EmpKey int,
EmpName varchar(20),
Email varchar(100),
Contact varchar(20)
)

activities.name: Delete File if Size less than 1kb

scripts.text:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS INVOICEDATA

CREATE TABLE INVOICEDATA(
[YEAR] int, 
[MONTH] tinyint,
INVOICEID varchar(20),
COUNTRY varchar(20),
REGION varchar(20),
SALES money
)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT COUNTRY,REGION
FROM INVOICEDATA
ORDER BY COUNTRY,REGION

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@replace(
replace(
'SELECT [YEAR], [MONTH], INVOICEID,SALES FROM INVOICEDATA
WHERE COUNTRY =''COUNTRYNAME'' AND REGION = ''REGIONNAME''',
'COUNTRYNAME', variables('Country')),'REGIONNAME',variables('Region'))

scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.CountryData', 'U') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.CountryData;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    CREATE TABLE 
dbo.CountryData (
        OrderDate datetime,
        ProductKey int,
        EnglishProductName varchar(250),
        SalesAmount money,
        Country varchar(30)
    );
END

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ColumnMappings;

CREATE TABLE ColumnMappings (
    ColumnNumber int,
    ColumnName varchar(100)
);

INSERT INTO ColumnMappings (ColumnNumber, ColumnName) VALUES
(1, 'OrderDate'),
(2, 'ProductKey'),
(3, 'Country'),
(4, 'EnglishProductName'),
(5, 'SalesAmount'),
(6, 'TaxAmt'),
(7, 'OrderQuantity'),
(8, 'UnitPrice'),
(9, 'TotalProductCost');

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TableName,DataLakePath,DataFileName
FROM tblMappings
WHERE IsActive = 1
